name: ComfyUI: Z-Image Turbo + Qwen-Image-Layered Pipeline
description: 2-stage ComfyUI pipeline: Z-Image Turbo (image gen) -> Qwen-Image-Layered (layer decomposition via ComfyUI-GGUF).
readme:
## ComfyUI Pipeline Server

### Endpoints
- `POST /generate` — Full pipeline (text -> image -> layers)
- `POST /generate-image-only` — Z-Image Turbo only
- `POST /decompose` — Qwen-Image-Layered only
- `GET /health` — Check model load status

### Models downloaded on first boot (~40 GB, cached on volume)
- `Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo` (diffusion model, text encoder, VAE)
- `unsloth/Qwen-Image-Layered-GGUF` (Q4_K_M)
- `Comfy-Org/HunyuanVideo_1.5_repackaged` (Qwen2.5-VL FP8 text encoder)
- `Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Layered_ComfyUI` (VAE)

### Minimum GPU: 24 GB VRAM (RTX 4090 / A5000 / L40)
### Recommended: 48+ GB VRAM (A40 / L40S / A100)
